Ability Capsule.description: Allows a Pokemon with one of its two standard Abilities to change to the other when used.

Relic Crown.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Relic Gold.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Relic Silver.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Relic Statue.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Relic Vase.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Repeat Ball.description: A Poke Ball that works well on Pokemon species that were previously caught.

Repel.description: No competitive use. Prevents wild Pokemon below the level of the lead Pokemon from appearing for 100 steps.

Reply Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Resist Wing.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Defense EV raised by 1.

Retro Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Revival Herb.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon is revived from fainting and has all of its HP restored, but has its Happiness lowered.

Revive.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon is revived from fainting and has 1/2 of its maximum HP restored, rounded down.

Rich Mulch.description: No competitive use. Used to grow Berries.

Rindo Berry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Grass-type attack. Single use.

Ring Target.description: The holder's type immunities granted solely by its typing are negated.

Rock Gem.description: The holder's first successful Rock-type attack has its power multiplied by 1.3. Single use.

Rock Incense.description: The holder's Rock-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Rocky Helmet.description: If the holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

Root Fossil.description: Can be revived into a Lileep.

Rose Incense.description: The holder's Grass-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Roseli Berry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Fairy-type attack. Single use.

Rowap Berry.description: If the holder is hit by a special attack, the attacker loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Single use.

Sachet.description: No competitive use. Evolves Spritzee into Aromatisse when traded.

Sacred Ash.description: No competitive use. All Pokemon in the party are revived from fainting and have all of their HP restored.

Safari Ball.description: A special Poke Ball that is used only in the Safari Zone and Great Marsh.

Safety Goggles.description: The holder is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail.

Sail Fossil.description: Can be revived into an Amaura.

Salac Berry.description: Raises the holder's Speed by 1 stage when it has 1/4 or less of its maximum HP. Single use.

Scizorite.description: If the holder is a Scizor, this item allows it to Mega Evolve into Mega Scizor in battle.

Scope Lens.description: The holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

Sea Incense.description: The holder's Water-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Shadow Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Sharp Beak.description: The holder's Flying-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Shed Shell.description: The holder can choose to switch out even when trapped by another Pokemon.

Shell Bell.description: After an attack by the holder, it restores 1/8 of the damage in HP dealt to other Pokemon.

Shiny Stone.description: No competitive use. An evolutionary item to be used on certain Pokemon.

Shock Drive.description: The holder's Techno Blast is Electric type.

Shuca Berry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ground-type attack. Single use.

Silk Scarf.description: The holder's Normal-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

SilverPowder.description: The holder's Bug-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Sitrus Berry.description: The holder restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP. Single use.

Skull Fossil.description: Can be revived into a Cranidos.

Sky Plate.description: The holder's Flying-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2. The holder's Judgment is Flying type.

Smoke Ball.description: No competitive use. The holder can always run from wild battles.

Smooth Rock.description: The holder's use of Sandstorm lasts 8 turns instead of 5. Does affect the Ability Sand Stream.

Snow Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Snowball.description: Raises the holder's Attack by 1 stage when damaged by an Ice-type attack. Single use.

Soda Pop.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has 60 HP restored.

Soft Sand.description: The holder's Ground-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Soothe Bell.description: No competitive use. Whenever the holder gains Happiness, it is multiplied by 1.5.

Soul Dew.description: If the holder is a Latias or a Latios, its Special Attack and Special Defense are multiplied by 1.5.

Space Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Spell Tag.description: The holder's Ghost-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Splash Plate.description: The holder's Water-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2. The holder's Judgment is Water type.

Spooky Plate.description: The holder's Ghost-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2. The holder's Judgment is Ghost type.

Sport Ball.description: A special Poke Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

Stable Mulch.description: No competitive use. Used to grow Berries.

Star Piece.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Stardust.description: No competitive use. Can be sold cheaply.

Starf Berry.description: Raises one of the holder's stats at random, besides accuracy and evasiveness, by 2 stages when it has 1/4 or less of its maximum HP. Single use.

Steel Gem.description: The holder's first successful Steel-type attack has its power multiplied by 1.3. Single use.

Steel Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Stick.description: If the holder is a Farfetch'd, its critical hit ratio is raised by 2 stages.

Sticky Barb.description: The holder loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. An attacker making contact with the holder receives this item if it is not currently holding one.

Stone Plate.description: The holder's Rock-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2. The holder's Judgment is Rock type.

Sun Stone.description: No competitive use. An evolutionary item to be used on certain Pokemon.

Super Potion.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has 50 HP restored.

Super Repel.description: No competitive use. Prevents wild Pokemon below the level of the lead Pokemon from appearing for 200 steps.

Surprise Mulch.description: No competitive use. Used to grow Berries.

Sweet Heart.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has 20 HP restored.

Swift Wing.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Speed EV raised by 1.

Tamato Berry.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Speed EV lowered by 10.

Tanga Berry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Bug-type attack. Single use.

Thanks Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Thick Club.description: If the holder is a Cubone or a Marowak, its Attack is doubled.

Thunderstone.description: No competitive use. An evolutionary item to be used on certain Pokemon.

Timer Ball.description: A Poke Ball that becomes better the more turns there are in a battle.

TinyMushroom.description: No competitive use. Can be sold cheaply.

Toxic Orb.description: At the end of each turn, this item attempts to badly poison the holder.

Toxic Plate.description: The holder's Poison-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2. The holder's Judgment is Poison type.

Tropic Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Tunnel Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

TwistedSpoon.description: The holder's Psychic-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Tyranitarite.description: If the holder is a Tyranitar, this item allows it to Mega Evolve into Mega Tyranitar in battle.

Ultra Ball.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

Up-Grade.description: No competitive use. Evolves Porygon into Porygon2 when traded.

Venusaurite.description: If the holder is a Venusaur, this item allows it to Mega Evolve into Mega Venusaur in battle.

Wacan Berry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Electric-type attack. Single use.

Water Gem.description: The holder's first successful Water-type attack has its power multiplied by 1.3. Single use.

Water Stone.description: No competitive use. An evolutionary item to be used on certain Pokemon.

Wave Incense.description: The holder's Water-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.

Wave Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

Weakness Policy.description: Raises the holder's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages after it is hit by a supereffective move. Single use.

Whipped Dream.description: No competitive use. Evolves Swirlix into Slurpuff when traded.

White Flute.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

White Herb.description: Restores all of the holder's lowered stat stages to 0 whenever one of its stat stages is less than 0. Single use.

Wide Lens.description: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is multiplied by 1.1.

Wiki Berry.description: The holder restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, and causes confusion if the holder has an Adamant, Careful, Impish, or Jolly nature. Single use.

Wise Glasses.description: The holder's special attacks have their power multiplied by 1.1.

Wood Mail.description: This item cannot be taken or stolen from the holder. Knock Off can remove it.

X Accuracy.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its accuracy raised by 1 stage in battle.

X Attack.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Attack raised by 1 stage in battle.

X Defend.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Defense raised by 1 stage in battle.

X Sp. Def.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Special Defense raised by 1 stage in battle.

X Special.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Special Attack raised by 1 stage in battle.

X Speed.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Speed raised by 1 stage in battle.

Yache Berry.description: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.

Yellow Flute.description: No competitive use. Can be sold for a high price.

Yellow Scarf.description: No competitive use. Increases the holder's Toughness.

Yellow Shard.description: No competitive use. Used to pay certain Move Tutors.

Zap Plate.description: The holder's Electric-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2. The holder's Judgment is Electric type.

Zinc.description: No competitive use. The selected Pokemon has its Special Defense EV raised by 10.

Zoom Lens.description: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is multiplied by 1.2 if it moves after the target.
